lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. star Draymond Green, who recently announced a $3.1 million donation to Michigan State, is part of a growing trend of philanthropy in sports.
snippet: The N.B.A. star Draymond Green, who recently announced a $3.1 million donation to Michigan State, is part of a growing trend of philanthropy in sports.
